1.title: What is this page?
1.subTitle: Introduction
1.content: Welcome to my personal website. This space is designed to introduce myself professionally, showcase my skills as a developer, and offer you an interactive experience to explore what I can create.

2.title: Who am I?
2.subTitle: About me
2.content: My name is Brayan Vidal Romero, and I am a full-stack developer with experience in building complete web applications — from the database to the user interface.

3.title: What do I do?
3.subTitle: Skills
3.content: I specialize in software development using technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, and more.

4.title: What’s the goal?
4.subTitle: Purpose
4.content: This website aims to showcase part of my work and skills. Here, you can interact with different components and explore examples of what I can build.

5.title: Need a website?
5.subTitle: For clients
5.content: If you have an idea, a business, or want to improve your online presence, I can help you create a professional, modern, and customized web solution. I work closely with my clients to turn their needs into functional and visually appealing products.

6.title: Explore and enjoy!
6.subTitle: Interactivity
6.content: This site is designed not just for reading about me, but also for interacting with it. You can change the site’s colors by creating your own palette, edit a table (add, edit, delete data), and easily access my social media to get in touch.
